channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cyfrinachau'r Llyfrgell
channel.desc: Yn rhannu cyfrinachau y tro yma y mae seren y llwyfan a'r sgrin sy'n dal i'n swyno yn ei 90au - Si?n Phillips. Sharing the library's top secrets this time is the evergreen Si?n Phillips.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Bois y Pizza
channel.desc: Mae Bois y Pizza ar fin cyrraedd gwinllannoedd Bordeaux cyn gweini pizzas i griw'r clwb rygbi yn nhref Agen. The Pizza Boys reach the vineyards of Bordeaux and feed some rugby players.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Timpo
channel.desc: Mae'r Po Dosbarthu yn ?l ac yn cael damwain - ond yn ceisio gwneud pethe'n well ei hun! The Delivery Po returns and has an accident, causing a problem that she wants to put right herself.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cymylaubychain
channel.desc: Amser stori yw un o hoff amserau Bobo Gwyn o'r dydd a heddiw mae'n clywed stori sy'n tanio'i ddychymyg! Bobo Gwyn loves storytime and today he hears a story which fires his imagination.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pablo
channel.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, a tydi o ddim yn hoffi pan mae ei g?t yn mynd yn rhy fach iddo. When Pablo's Mum says his coat is getting too small, Pablo draws himself smaller.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Odo
channel.desc: Mae Martin yn gor-ddweud pethau am ei gartref, ac felly mae Odo a Dwdl yn trio gwella Gwersyll Maes y Mes. Martin exaggerates what his home was like and thus influences Odo and Doodle.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ahoi!
channel.desc: Tro mor ladron ifanc Ysgol Gelli Onnen yw hi heddiw i herio Capten Cnec a'u dasgau. Today it's the turn of the young pirates from Ysgol Gelli Onnen to challengen Capten Cnec and his tasks.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Caban Banana Gareth
channel.desc: Mae Gareth yr Orangutan yn teithio ysgolion Cymru yn trafod pob math o bynciau difyr. Wythnos yma, Diddordebau ydi'r pwnc trafod. This week, Hobbies is the schools topic of discussion.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Octonots
channel.desc: Mae nith a nai Capten Cwrwgl yn helpu eu hewythr i geisio achub tri walrws bach sydd mewn perygl ar ffloch i?. Capten Cwrwgl's niece and nephew help save walrus pups on a drifting ice floe.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Annibendod
channel.desc: Mae Gari'n poeni bod llygoden yn yr ysgol ond yn methu ei ddal, ac mae Miss Enfys wedi drysu ei diwrnodau. Gary's worried there's a mouse in the school but he can't catch it.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Patrol Pawennau
channel.desc: Pa driciau sydd gan Maer Campus i ennill y gystadleuaeth coginio tsili? What tricks does Mayor Campus use to try and win the chilli bake-off.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Parc Glan Gwil
channel.desc: Mae'r criw'n mynd i bysgota ond does gan Glynwen ddim gwialen. Mae Misha yn dangos iddi nad oes angen yr offer gorau i ddal y sgodyn mwya. The crew go fishing but Glynwen Glanhau has no rod.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Byd Carlo Bach
channel.desc: Mae Carlo wrth ei fodd yn tyfu llysiau. Pwy arall sydd yn hoffi bwyta llysiau? Carlo likes to grow vegetables. Who else likes to eat vegetables.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Joni Jet
channel.desc: Wedi i Dan Jerus gael damwain a difetha tasg Jetboi a Jetferch, rhaid iddynt ddysgu i gydweithio er mwyn dianc wrth Cwstenin. Dan Jerus, Jet-boy & Jet-girl must learn to work together.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
channel.desc: Mae Llew wedi cyffroi'n l?n. Mae'n credu ei fod yn ben-blwydd arno heddiw! Yn anffodus, yfory mae ei ben-blwydd. Llew thinks it's his birthday but it's not until tomorrow. He's confused.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Blero'n Mynd i Ocido
channel.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Blero heddiw, tybed? What's happening in the Blero world today.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Byd Tad-cu
channel.desc: Mae Nel yn holi 'Pam bod arogl neis ar flodau?', ac mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori am arddwr gorau'n byd a'i phridd arbennig. Today Nel asks Tad-cu, 'Why do flowers smell so nice?

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Blociau Lliw
channel.desc: Mae Coch a Melyn yn cwrdd ag Oren. Dysga beth sy'n digwydd pan ti'n cymysgu Coch a Melyn. Red and Yellow meet new arrival Orange. Discover what happens when you mix red and yellow.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
channel.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Digbi Draig
channel.desc: Mae Betsi yn meddwl ei bod wedi rhoi swyn ar Conyn a'i wneud yn gawr. Betsi thinks she's turned Conyn into a giant! Cochyn and Digbi explain they've just seen him and he's the right size.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
channel.desc: Mae Crawc wrth ei fodd pan mae hwyaden fach newydd yn deor ac yn closio ato'n syth. In trying to rehome a duckling on the river, Crawc puts it in grave danger. Oh no.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Fferm Fach
channel.desc: Mae Nel a Guto eisiau gwybod o ble mae m?l yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd ? nhw i Fferm Fach am dro ac am wers. Nel and Guto want to know where Honey comes from.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Timpo
channel.desc: Wrth i'r Pocadlys gael ei ddrysu, mae tensiwn yn codi wrth geisio datrys y broblem. When HQ gets twisted up, tensions are stretched tight to fix the problem.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cymylaubychain
channel.desc: Beth sydd yn codi ofn ar y ceffylau nen heddiw? What is frightening the horses today.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pablo
channel.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond beth ydi'r golau disglair sydd yn pefrio mor ddel? Everyone loves the Sparkles and it soon becomes a game of trying to catch them.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Odo
channel.desc: Er mwyn i Iago neud ffrindiau rhaid iddo fe fod "yn fe ei hunan", yn ol Odo a Dwdl. Odo and Doodle help John John with how to make friends by "being yourself.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ahoi!
channel.desc: Pwy fydd y m?r-ladron sy'n ymuno ? Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Caban Banana Gareth
channel.desc: Mi fydd Gareth yr Orangutan yn teithio ysgolion ledled Cymru yn trafod pob math o bynciau. Wythnos yma, Gwyliau ydi'r pwnc trafod. This week, Holiday is the topic of discussion.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Octonots
channel.desc: Mae Harri a'r Octonots yn helpu hen ffrindiau, y Crancod Cnau Coco, i ddarganfod pwy sy'n dwyn eu cnau coco. Harri and the Octonauts help their old friends the Coconut Crabs.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Annibendod
channel.desc: Mae Gwyneth Gwrtaith yn cynnal te prynhawn. Ond mae pethau'n mynd yn anniben iawn pan bod gyrr o wartheg yn ymyrryd. An afternoon tea turns into chaos when a herd of cows turn up.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Patrol Pawennau
channel.desc: Pam fod Maer Campus yn ymddwyn gymaint fel babi? Ydi o rhywbeth i'w wneud ? llaeth y gneuen goco aur mae o wedi ei yfed? Why is Mayor Campus acting like a baby.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Parc Glan Gwil
channel.desc: Mae Tref yn cael trafferth gyda'r peiriant golchi ac mae llanast yn y golchdy! Tref is having trouble with the washing machine and there is a mess in the laundry.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
channel.desc: Mae Sue ac Emrys yn teithio i Aachen, Yr Almaen, i werthu ebol mewn arwerthiant fawr. Sue & co travel to Aachen, Germany, to sell a foal at one of the world's largest Arabian horse auctions.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Mae Gareth yr Orangutan yn teithio ysgolion ledled Cymru yn trafod amryw bynciau. Wythnos yma, Anifeiliaid Anwes ydi'r pwnc trafod. This week, Pets is the topic of discussion.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Byd Carlo Bach
channel.desc: Mae Carlo yn hoffi chwarae efo pypedau. Tybed sut beth fyddai bod yn byped ar gortyn? Carlo likes to play with puppets. What would it feel like to be a puppet on a string.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Byd Tad-cu
channel.desc: Pam bod mwnc?od yn byw mewn coed'? yw cwestiwn Jamal i Tad-cu heddiw. Why do monkeys live in trees? Tad-cu has an absurd story, full o fun about two cheeky monkeys named Jess and Caleb.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
channel.desc: Mae dwr yn diferu o'r to gan dorri ar draws cyngerdd ffidil Crawc. Crawc tries to fix a roof which starts leaking mid-violin performance and discovers the leaks give him a musical bonus.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Parc Glan Gwil
channel.desc: Mae Tref Trefn wedi trefnu noson gyda band enwog yn Parc Glan Gwil - ond alla nhw ddim dod! Trefn Trefn has organised an evening with a famous band in Parc Glan Gwil - but they can't come.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Bwystfil
channel.desc: Dyw anifeiliaid byth yn stopio symud, ac mae'n amser nawr i gwrdd ? deg bwysfil sy'n symud mewn grwpiau. The animal kingdom never stops moving. We now meet 10 beasts who move in groups.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Gwrach y Rhibyn
channel.desc: Cyfres antur lle mae pedwar t?m yn ceisio dianc rhag Gwrach y Rhibyn cyn i'r haul fachlud. Ysgol Gwent Is Coed, Bro Teifi and Maes Garmon face trials and tribulations aplenty this time.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Smyrffs
channel.desc: Mae Twmffat yn dod o hyd i wy yn y goedwig ac yn penderfynu ei fod am fod yn "fam". Twmffat finds an egg in the woods and decides he's going to be a "mother.

channel.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

channel.title: Cartrefi Cymru

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Rownd a Rownd
channel.desc: Mae perthynas Mathew ac Elen yn parhau i flodeuo a'r ddau yn cytuno ei bod hi'n amser i ddatgelu'r newyddion. Kelvin works hard on his secret plan - which creates big problems in the caf?.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Bing
channel.desc: Mae gan Pando eiriau yn ei ben ond nid yw Bing yn hoff ohonynt! Sometimes silly words are fun, but not if they make your friend feel bad. Pando has an earworm and Bing isn't impressed.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Twt
channel.desc: Mae Cen Twyn wedi creu cerbyd newydd sbon ar olwynion. Cen Twyn has created a brand new vehicle with wheels. Twt achieves one of his dreams and is able to come out of the water.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
channel.desc: Y tro hwn fe awn i'r Bahamas ac i Florida i gwrdd a'r Fflamingo a'r Dolffin. The journey takes us to the Bahamas and to Florida to meet the Flamingo and the Dolphin.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Chwedlau Tinga Tinga
channel.desc: Heddiw, cawn glywed pam mae Broga'n crawcian. Colourful stories from Africa about animals of the world. Today we find out why Frog croaks.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Deian a Loli
channel.desc: Dyw Deian ddim yn deall pam fasa Loli eisiau treulio amser ar ei phen ei hun yn darllen yn lle chwara! Deian doesn't understand why Loli wants to spend time alone reading, and not playing.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Yr Whws
channel.desc: Mae planhigion wedi ymddangos yn ngardd lysiau Eli ac wedi creu annibendod. Ond nid hi blannodd nhw. Plants which Ellie didn't plant have appeared in her veg patch, making it look messy.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sam Tan
channel.desc: Anturiaethau Sam T?n a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam T?n and friends in the village.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ein Byd Bach
channel.desc: Dysgwn am y pethau hynaf ar ein planed - y Ddaear ei hun, coed, adeiladau a henebion fel Cor y Cewri, cestyll gwahanol ac offerynnau hen fel y Sither Tsieineaidd. We learn about Dinosaurs.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Guto Gwningen
channel.desc: Anturiaethau Guto Gwningen a'i ffrindiau. The animated tales of a little bunny and his friends.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Help Llaw
channel.desc: Harri gets a call from Lisa and her father - their welding machine has broken and Harri goes to help. Mae Harri'n cael galwad gan Lisa a'i thad gan fod y peiriant weldio wedi torri.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
channel.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sion y Chef
channel.desc: Mae Si?n wedi trefnu dawns-ginio ac yn cael gwersi cha cha cha gan Mama Polenta. Si?n learns the cha cha cha, but has to improvise when the town hall roof collapses.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Caru Canu a Stori
channel.desc: Mae Morus Mwnci wedi trefnu mordaith ac yn aros i'w ffrindiau gyrraedd, ond does dim golwg o'r un ohonyn nhw! Morus Monkey has organized a boat trip - but where on earth are his friends.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Abadas
channel.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod llawn hwyl ar ynys yr Abadas heddiw ac mae digon o hwyl i'w gael. It's time for another adventure with the Abadas! As they finish tidying up, Ben has a new word to look for.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Awyr Iach
channel.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn ymweld a Gwenyn Gruffydd, a bydd rhai o ddisgyblion Ysgol Tyle'r Ynn yn cael gwers feicio. Huw explores a special path with members from Clwb Gwerin y Coed.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sali Mali
channel.desc: Mae Jaci Soch yn benderfynol o glywed c?r y wawr ac yn ceisio cadw'n effro mewn sawl ffordd wahanol. Jaci Soch is determined to hear the dawn chorus and tries lots of ways to keep awake.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Twm Twrch
channel.desc: Mae Twm Twrch a Lisa L?n am gynnal clyweliadau i ddewis y gorau o dalentau Cwmtwrch er mwyn cael cyngerdd mawr llawn hwyl a sbri. Lisa L?n and Twm Twrch decide to hold talent auditions.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
channel.desc: Heddiw ry' ni am ymweld ?'r wlad fwyaf deheuol ar gyfandir Affrica, De Affrica. We go on safari and learn about capital cities Pretoria, Cape Town & Bloemfontein in South Africa.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pentre Papur Pop
channel.desc: Ar antur heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n teithio i'r gofod i'r Blaned Pop! Mae Mai-Mai yn meddwl fo'r blaned wedi ei wneud o gaws! On today's poptastic adventure, the friends travel to outer space.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Amser Maith Maith yn ?l
channel.desc: Stori am Tomi a Gwen sy'n byw adeg Y Rhyfel Byd Cyntaf sydd gan Tadcu i Ceti heddiw. Today, Grandad has a story about Gwen and Tomi who live during the First World War.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Bing
channel.desc: Mae'n benblwydd Bing! Mae'n dangos i Swla, Pando a Coco sut i wneud y Cwaca-oci. It's Bing's birthday! He shows Sula, Pando & Coco how to do the waka-oke.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Twt
channel.desc: Mae Bethan yn penderfynu creu casgliad o rywbeth ond mae methu'n l?n ? phenderfynu beth i'w gasglu. Bethan decides to start up her own collection, but can't decide what to collect.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
channel.desc: Y tro hwn mae'r daith yn mynd i'r mor i gwrdd a Cheffyl y mor ac i ben y coed i gwrdd a'r Gibon. We journey under the sea to meet the Sea Horse and up into the trees to find the Gibbon.

channel.desc: Heddiw, cawn glywed pam mae mwnc?od yn neidio trwy'r coed. Colourful stories from Africa about animals of the world. Today we find out why monkeys swing in the trees.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.title: Am Dro!
channel.desc: Awn i Geredigion, Mynydd Carningli, Llanllechid, a Portmeirion gyda Iestyn, Sian, Sara a Huw. This time, we visit Ceredigion, Carningli mountain, Llanllechid in Bethesda, and Portmeirion.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Yr Whws
channel.desc: Mae Eli am chwarae o dan enfys. Ar ?l pendroni sut mae'r enfys yn diflannu ac yna'n ail-ymddangos, maent yn darganfod mwy. Ellie really wants to play under a rainbow, but is puzzled by it.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sam Tan
channel.desc: Mae Malcolm, Mike, Helen, Mandy a Norman wedi mynd i gerdded, ond mae tan yn dechrau yn y goedwig! Malcolm, Mike, Helen, Mandy and Norman go out walking, but a fire starts in the forest.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
channel.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon cwn yw'r thema - y ci anwes a'r ci gwyllt Affricanaidd. In this programme dogs are the theme - the pet dog and the wild African dog.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Guto Gwningen
channel.desc: Anturiaethau Guto Gwningen a'i ffrindiau. The animated tales of a little bunny and his friends.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Awyr Iach
channel.desc: Ymunwch gyda Meleri a Huw ar gyfer antur yn yr awyr agored. Meleri kayaks with Llandysul Paddlers, we'll meet Owen and his grandfather, and Elan will be teaching Huw how to ride a horse.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Oi! Osgar
channel.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
channel.desc: Pan mae Mwmian yn cyrraedd Ty Mwmin yn ddirybudd gyda'i HOLL blant afreolus, profir goddefgarwch y teulu Mwmin! The biggest challenge falls to Mwmintrol today, who has to deal with Fi Fach.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Efaciw?s
channel.desc: while the boys learn how to fish, the girls clean the cowshed.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Adeiladu'r Freuddwyd
channel.desc: Dilynwn Emilie a Jon a werthodd popeth gan symud i Orllewin Cymru i greu safle glampio. Ond ma heriau yn eu disgwyl. Series following a couple who moved to Wales to set up a glamping site.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sgorio
channel.desc: Y Fflint v Llansawel, a'r gorau o'r frwydr fawr: Caerdydd v Abertawe yn Adran Premier Genero. All the action and excitement of the Welsh football pyramid.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pobol y Cwm
channel.desc: Mae Gaynor ar chw?l wrth geisio dygymod ?'r gwir, a Tom yn cymryd yr awenau gyda threfniadau'r briodas. Tom is keen to plan the wedding, whilst Gaynor struggles to deal with the truth.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Rownd a Rownd
channel.desc: Mae Britney dal wedi mopio hefo Steve, hyd yn oed pan mae o'n gofyn iddi neud ffafr beryglus iddo. With Rhys recovering, Sian hopes to build bridges with Trystan.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cyfrinachau'r Llyfrgell
channel.desc: Yn rhannu cyfrinachau y tro hwn mae'r arwr rygbi Scott Quinell, sy'n codi ymwybyddiaeth o'r cyflwr dyslecsia. Today, we're with rugby legend and spokesperson for dyslexia, Scott Quinell.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Clwb Rygbi
channel.desc: Uchafbwyntiau bob g?m o'r rownd ddiweddaraf Super Rygbi Cymru. Highlights of every game from the latest round of Super Rygbi Cymru. English language commentary is also available.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Gareth Jones
channel.desc: Y nofiwr gwyllt Caris Bowen sy'n cefnogi Gareth wrth iddo deithio ar draws y gogledd cyn gorffen yn yr afon Conwy. After three weeks of swimming, will Gareth have enough energy to finish.
